item.title: Unlocking a Caddx Alarm
item.description: I woke up one day with the thought “Gee, it would be nice to have my house alarm send notifications”…. which seems like a simple enough idea in theory. Unfortunately the Alarm industry has other ideas. My original alarm was a Hills NetworX NX-4, which is actually a Caddx NX-8. It was also sold as a GE NX-8. It has an IP enabling add on card available (and I use “add-on card” very loosely) called a “ComNav” module.
